newsitem.title: USA: USAir plane makes emergency landing.
newsitem.headline: USAir plane makes emergency landing.

text.p: A USAir Group Inc plane made an emergency landing in Indiana on Wednesday due to a possible fire, a spokesman said.
None of the 171 passengers aboard the Boeing Co 757 aircraft travelling from Phoenix to Pittsburgh were injured.
"(The plane) had indications of a problem," said spokesman Paul Turk, adding that it "diverted with possible fire."
He could not confirm reports by cable television station MSNBC that smoke was in the back of the plane.
Flight 158 was at the gate in Terre Haute, Ind., for inspection, said Turk of Arlington, Va.-based USAir.
"Whatever (the problem) was, it was over when they got down on the ground," Turk said.
